pageContext.claim: “We -- look, we're in an area of the world -- we're 8,000 miles away. Some of us -- I guess, most of us came here together. We want other players in this area to help. They don't like ISIS either. They don't like al Qaeda either. And they have to help also. You have countries that are right nearby that are very big, that have power, and they should be doing some of the work too, not just the United States.”
pageContext.analysis: Many of the surrounding countries have accepted refugees and are involved as proxies with the conflicts in Afghanistan and Syria.
